cause.description:
We require add'l funding for a projest near and dear to our hearts.. the Caipirinha HotTub...Please send what you can afford so we can be swimming in Lime and Vodka and still be able to afford to feed our disadvantaged children...
1. to swim
2. drink Caipirinha out of the hottub with a straw
3. to feed the starving children and parents
cause.name: Feed the starving village on Nipigon St
